info.name: Collection - Learn Express JS
info.description: API Endpoint for Learn Express JS backend apps.

item.name: Request Auth

request.description: A request for creating a new administrator user. You can skip or block this endpoint for security reasons.
This request will return an access_token and refresh_token. Save both token on client side and use it for authorization,
This request will delete session or token.

item.description: A group of request for creating and modifying sessions.

item.name: Request Level

request.description: A private request for create a level. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will return all of your level data. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will return a single data of your level based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will update a single data of your level based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will delete a single data based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.

item.description: A group of request for creating and modifying levels.

item.name: Request User

request.description: A private request for create a user. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will return all of your user data. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will return a single data of your user based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will update a single data based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.
This request will delete a single data based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.

item.description: A group of request for creating and modifying users.

item.name: Request Information

formdata.value: Some sample stuff for development purpose

request.description: A private request for create an app info. You need an authorization for this request.

formdata.value: Some sample stuff for development purpose

request.description: This request will return all of your app info data. You need an authorization for this request.

response.name: Info - Get All Data

request.description: This request will return a single data of your app info based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.

response.name: Info - Get Single Data

formdata.value: Some edited sample stuff for development purpose

request.description: This request will update a single data based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.

formdata.value: Some edited sample stuff for development purpose

request.description: This request will delete a single data based on an id that you provide on url. You need an authorization for this request.

item.description: A group of request for creating and modifying apps information.
